channel.title: [317] Light up / clear prayer buttons
channel.description:
[s]How can I make the prayer buttons appear selected or clear them (make them unselected)?[/s]
I am trying to remake the prayer system for my 317 base source. How can I tell the client not to light up the selected prayer when clicked or to turn the light on that prayer off? For example, when the user is out of points or when their prayer level is not high enough.

item.title: [317] Light up / clear prayer buttons
item.dc:creator: @MR_Terror MR Terror
item.description:
@MR_Terror wrote:

server side… dont ask me where

Read full topic

item.title: [317] Light up / clear prayer buttons
item.dc:creator: @jSherz jSherz
item.description:
@jSherz wrote:

[quote=“m1lkman, post:4, topic:433081”][quote author=jSherz link=topic=535802.msg3917841#msg3917841 date=1329386012]
So, for example, when someone clicks a prayer they can’t use or runs out of points - the client changes the button to no longer be lit up?
[/quote]

It works like this:

On Click of the Button ID, it checks if the player has the level for the prayer and prayer points, if they return true, the unlit prayer icon image is replaced with the lit prayer icon image, else it doesn’t do anything.[/quote]

So that is done client side?

Read full topic

item.title: [317] Light up / clear prayer buttons
item.dc:creator: @m1lkman m1lkman
item.description:
@m1lkman wrote:

jSherz:

So, for example, when someone clicks a prayer they can’t use or runs out of points - the client changes the button to no longer be lit up?

It works like this:

On Click of the Button ID, it checks if the player has the level for the prayer and prayer points, if they return true, the unlit prayer icon image is replaced with the lit prayer icon image, else it doesn’t do anything.
